articles.title: Starbucks, McDonald’s and Others Pause Operations in Russia - The New York Times
articles.description: After years of cultivating the Russian market, McDonald’s, Starbucks, PepsiCo and Coca-Cola said they would temporarily close locations or stop selling products there.
articles.content: Russian operations make up only 3 percent of McDonalds operating income but 9 percent of its revenue. Likewise, Russia accounts for $3.4 billion, or 4 percent, of PepsiCos annual revenue of $79.4 bil… [+1570 chars]
